text:
Hi Lucy, 
Happy holidays :blush: 
I hope you're having a good Christmas too, sorry I didnt get these messages until now (I guess sometimes thinking about work is overwhelming, but I'm managing :/ )

The work that you're doing for christmas over in union is really cool by the way 

So far I've advised to apply for a foundation year in art college/uni instead of going straight into degree, so I'm confident on that particular decision  
However there is one thing I'm not too confident on and that's my personal statement since I actually wrote it for UCAS/degree course applications 
I'm not too sure on how to condense it into 500 words :( 
When you're free, could you give it a read and give some feedback? The last thing I want to do is interrupt your holiday / schedule so whenever is fine

I've also made a few new things that might be ok for the portfoilo that I'd like to show you, but I still need to refine those a bit before I'm comfortable with showing anyone 
Thank you again for your support :sparkler: :gift:

ive attached the statement in this link: 
<https://thomastallis-my.sharepoint.com/:w:/g/personal/zlee_thomastallis_org_uk/EbVzb8KET0lDkabaX8WXiZwBlbqhlgg11ypMaK18TgEAdA?e=NzMF5q|https://thomastallis-my.sharepoint.com/:w:/g/personal/zlee_thomastallis_org_uk/EbVzb8KET0lDkabaX8WXiZwBlbqhlgg11ypMaK18TgEAdA?e=NzMF5q>:w:/g/personal/zlee_thomastallis_org_uk/EbVzb8KET0lDkabaX8WXiZwBlbqhlgg11ypMaK18TgEAdA?e=NzMF5q
